                                    int endIdx,
                                    java.lang.String del)
        Joins together strings with a specified delimiter between the segments
        Parameters:
        segs - an array of strings to be joined together
        startIdx - the index of the first string that will be part of the result
        endIdx - the string with the end index will not be include
        del - the delimiter to use to join the strings
        Returns:

      • camelCaseToUser

        public static java.lang.String camelCaseToUser(java.lang.String str)
        Accepts a string, searches it for all uppercase characters and then ensures the first character is capitalized. When a capital character found the method inserts a space at the end of the string for every capital letter and shifts all characters at and below the current index to index + 1. Then a space is inserted at the current index and the method continues.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to be made processed
        Returns:
        A more human readable version of str

      • capitalize

        public static java.lang.String capitalize(java.lang.String value)

      • upperUnderscoreToLowercaseUser

        public static java.lang.String upperUnderscoreToLowercaseUser(java.lang.String value)
        Converts a string which is in upper underscore format to a phrase which is all in lowercase. Example NEW_CLASSIFIER => new classifier
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
